<title level="2" right="Creature 6">[Kolbo](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1635)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Dwarf" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=54" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #170: Spoken on the Song Wind](/Sources.aspx?ID=97) pg. 49</row>

**Perception** +12; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2), [Dwarven](/Languages.aspx?ID=3), [Jotun](/Languages.aspx?ID=8)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +14, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +15, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +13, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +12, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +14

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +2

**Con** +4

**Int** +2

**Wis** +1

**Cha** +3
</row>

**A Quick Word** If Kolbo is aware of his opponents and isn't prevented from speaking, he rolls [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) for initiative.

**Items**
[Heavy Crossbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=70) (10 bolts), [lesser elixir of life](/Equipment.aspx?ID=91), [Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4), [Longsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=31), strongbox key, [Thieves' Tools](/Equipment.aspx?ID=58)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 24 

**Fort** +16 

**Ref** +14 

**Will** +13 

</row>

**HP** 115

**Deny Advantage** Kolbo isn't [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) to creatures of 6th level or lower that are [hidden](/Conditions.aspx?ID=22), [undetected](/Conditions.aspx?ID=39), flanking, or using surprise attack.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
longsword +17 ([versatile P](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d8+6 slashing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
heavy crossbow +15 ([range increment 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 1](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)),
**Damage** 1d10 piercing

**Low Blow** <actions string="Reaction" />  **Requirements** Kolbo successfully [Feints](/Actions.aspx?ID=48) an opponent; **Effect** The foe is knocked [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31).

**[Sneak Attack](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=34)**   Kolbo deals an extra 2d6 precision damage to [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) creatures.

</column>
